thread.title: Post-Brexit passport to be made in the EU

title: Post-Brexit passport to be made in the EU
text:
Post-Brexit passport to be made in the EU 1:41pm EDT - 01:40 
The new blue British passports that Prime Minister Theresa May hailed as ''an expression of our independence and sovereignty'' after Brexit will be made by a Franco-Dutch firm, the boss of the British company which lost the contract said on Thursday. Kate King reports.   new blue British passports that Prime Minister Theresa May hailed as "an expression of our independence and sovereignty" after Brexit will be made by a Franco-Dutch firm, the boss of the British company which lost the contract said on Thursday. Kate King reports.  //reut.rs/2pyCP2D
